questions.question: He didn’t work hard ……………………. he failed his exam.
………………….. had the hunter raised the gun, than the birds flew away.
questions.description: The correct conjunction is no sooner ... than...

questions.question: She is …………………… intelligent to be defeated.
……………………. had she got the message when she started.
……………………… my children are employed, I have no financial difficulties.
They still live in the house ………………………… was built by their grandfather.
questions.description: Either which or that can refer to non-living things in identifying relative clauses.

questions.question: ……………………… he saw a dog, he threw stones at it.
questions.description: Whenever means it doesn't matter when.

questions.question: You should neither see him …………………… call him.
…………………… he is honest, everybody respects him.
questions.description: All of these words indicate the reason for something.

questions.question: ……………………. my mother is a doctor, she knows how to dress a wound.
You will not be able to meet him ………………………. you arrive in time.
questions.description: Unless is similar to if not.

questions.question: …………………… his health is poor, he attends his office regularly.
questions.description: Although is similar to but it is used to connect two contrasting ideas.
